name: Tavern Catastrophe
description:
Tavern Catastrophe is a physics cleanup mini game. 

Backstory: You are the owner of the only Tavern in Earnest, a small docking town. You come back one early morning to ﬁnd the place left in a catastrophe (presumably from a drunk brawl), and unfortunately, you are left to clean it up. 

The goal of the game is clean up the Tavern as much as possible.
